MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.StableDistribution Class Reference

Provides generation of levy skew alpha-stable distributed random numbers. More...

 Gets the mean value of generated random numbers. Throws NotSupportedException if Exponent <= 1.0, since the value is not defined in this case.
override double Median [get]
 Gets the median of generated random numbers.
override double Variance [get]
 Gets the variance of generated random numbers.
override double Skewness [get]
 Gets the skewness of generated random numbers.

Detailed Description

Provides generation of levy skew alpha-stable distributed random numbers.

The implementation of the StableDistribution type bases upon information presented on Wikipedia - Levy skew alpha-stable distribution

Determines whether the specified parameters is valid.

Returns:
if scale is greater than or equal to 0.0, skewness is between -1.0 and 1.0 and exponent is between 0.0 and 2.0; otherwise, .
